summary: Frontend-only testing completed for OphtaGestion cabinet médical multi-centres application. All requested features verified: Login/Logout, hamburger menu navigation, Planning views (Jour/Semaine/Mois), Congés with modern UI, gradient headers. Responsive design tested on desktop and mobile (390x844).
critical_code_review_comments: App.js is a monolithic file (~20750 lines) - consider splitting into modular components for maintainability
Console shows repeated 'Date aujourd'hui pour Actualités' logs (12x per render) - minor performance concern but not blocking
context_for_next_testing_agent: Application is a multi-center medical cabinet management system. Login works with directeur@cabinet.fr/admin123. Modern KEAP-inspired UI with gradient headers (cyan/turquoise #0091B9 to #19CD91). All tested features working: Login with credential validation, hamburger menu with all 12 navigation items, Planning with 3 views (Jour shows date banner with Matin/Après-midi sections, Semaine shows week calendar with filters, Mois shows monthly calendar), Congés with stat cards and filter tabs. Responsive design verified on mobile (390x844) - all views adapt correctly. Page reload maintains session state. Logout redirects to login page properly.

login_functionality.details: Login with directeur@cabinet.fr/admin123 works correctly, shows 'Connexion réussie!' toast, redirects to dashboard

logout_functionality.details: Logout button works, redirects to login page with 'Déconnexion réussie' toast

hamburger_menu_navigation.details: Menu opens on click, shows all navigation items: Actualités, Mon Profil, Personnel, Planning, Congés, Demande de créneaux, Messages, Mon Coffre-Fort, Plan Cabinet, Gestion Salles, Gestion Stocks, Administration, Gestion Centres

planning_vue_jour.details: Day view shows gradient header 'Planning Interactif', date selector, day banner 'Samedi 28 février 2026', Matin and Après-midi sections with 0 créneaux messages

planning_vue_semaine.details: Week view shows 7-day calendar (Lun-Dim), role filters (Tous, Médecins, Assistants, Secrétaires), week navigation arrows, date range display

planning_vue_mois.details: Month view shows full calendar grid for February 2026, month selector, each day shows Matin/Après-midi slots

conges_interface.details: Modern gradient header 'Gestion des Congés', stat cards (En attente/Approuvées/Refusées/Total), filter tabs (Toutes/En attente/Validées), employee dropdown filter, '+ Nouvelle Demande' button

gradient_headers.details: Both Planning and Congés pages display modern cyan-to-green gradient headers with white text

mobile_responsiveness.details: Tested on 390x844 viewport - all views adapt correctly: Planning views show compact layout, Congés stat cards in 2x2 grid, hamburger menu works properly, view switcher buttons visible in header

page_reload_handling.details: User session persists after page reload - stays logged in and maintains navigation state

mocked_apis.firebase_push_notifications: MOCKED - Firebase SDK not initialized due to missing FIREBASE_CREDENTIALS environment variable (from previous iteration)
